pain_points.description: Lack of visibility into waitlist numbers for events.
supporting_quotes: Does it tell you how many people are on the wait list for a given event?
If there's 20 people on it, how many are you going to buy?
If there's one or two... That's a good point.
pain_points.current_workarounds: Users guess based on past experiences or make assumptions about the demand.
pain_points.impact: Users may miss out on buying tickets if they don't know the demand level.
